firstImpression.title: A bit about me
firstImpression.box1Text: Explore and collaborate on my open source projects. Your contributions are welcome!
firstImpression.box2Text: I value modularity to create scalable and efficient solutions.
firstImpression.box3Text: I focus on simple and intuitive solutions for the user.
firstImpression.box4Text: I'm always learning to improve my skills and adapt to new trends.

projects.title: Highlights
projects.item2Desc: A transaction manager for seafood products.

about.title: About Me
about.item1Text: I am a passionate full-stack developer specializing in web and software development. With expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, I bring comprehensive solutions to every project.
about.item2Text: I leverage reactive technologies and modern styling approaches to deliver scalable and user-friendly applications.
about.item3Text: My development journey spans from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring a cohesive and high-quality outcome.
